application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
TPO.60 - T7 - Quercus robur: Near junction Olive Road Cherry Close:  Remove dead limb over highway side to just above v Union
Flank of 20, rear garden Cherry Close: T14 - Juglans regia:   Reduce Crown Medium (25%); T15 -  Juglans regia: Fell to 4 metre stump (Regulation 3 application from London Borough of Ealing)
decision_conditions: The replacement tree must be planted on or near the existing tree by April 2026; the tree replacement should be of a Field Maple (Acer campestre) and of a size not less than 10-12cm girth when planted.

Reason: To ensure the continued amenity provided by the tree(s) and the planting of an appropriate species and in order to preserve the character and appearance of Cherry Close. | The tree work specified above must be carried out within 2 years of the date of this decision.

Reason: To ensure the work is only carried out once in respect of this consent and allow Ealing Council the opportunity to reconsider its decision in the light of prevailing circumstances, and reconsult on the case in the event of the consent expiring before implementation.
